channel.title: Server randomly stops working
channel.description:
Yeah, sounds crazy, but it's IntdubPK - one of the shittiest PI servers out there
I can't get rid of the server, my players somehow [i]enjoy[/i] the piece of shit. The autorestarter (thanks pizzapie) saves me sometimes, the timer is set to 7 minutes for a restart. The random disconnections are usually around 3 minutes at some times, other times it's 30 minutes, and a few times it's actually been right after a restart (20 seconds). How can I fix this so it doesn't just 'stop working'? Thanks..

item.title: Server randomly stops working
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Well not sure, never used indubpk…

Read full topic

item.title: Server randomly stops working
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

drubrkletern:

Probably has a horrible byte/int memory leak, just off the top guess.

It does… All PI servers have memory leaks. Is there any cheap fix for this, just to patch it up for a few weeks so I can get started with a new server?

Read full topic
